title: LIVE AT KNEBWORTH DVD 1 OF 2 ( VOL. I & II )
description:
English:

/// This is DVD 1 of 2///

Knebworth, Hertfordshire, June 30, 1990. 120,000 fans gathered for an historic concert event to aid the Nordoff-Robbins Music Therapy Centre and the BRIT School for Performing Arts and Technology. This incredible benefit concert was an instant success due to the high-energy, awe-inspiring performances of such rock &#039;n&#039; roll legends as Paul McCartney, Phil Collins, Pink Floyd, Eric Clapton, Elton John, Mark Knopfler, Robert Plant, Jimmy Page, Status Quo, Tears For Fears and Cliff Richard & The Shadows. The 2002 DVD edition features a new 5.1 Dolby Surround and DTS sound mix.

* Personnel includes: Eric Clapton, Cliff Richard & The Shadows, Phil Collins, Candy Dulfer, Pink Floyd, See more
* Format: Color, Dolby, DVD-Video, PAL, DVD 9 Dual Layer
* Audio Tracks: English (Dolby Digital 5.1), English (DTS), English (Dolby Digital 2.0 Stereo)
  New 5.1 and DTS sound mix
* Language: English
* Region: All
* Aspect Ratio: 4:3 Screen format
* Number of discs: 1 of 2  
* Studio: Eagle Rock
* DVD Release Date: November 19, 2002
* Run Time: 180 minutes
* DVD One tracklisting:
